title: IBM Cloud Now: ICCT and Freelancer, Watson AIOps Customer Advisory Council, and TrustRadius Awards
caption: a new partnership with freelancer the introduction of the watson aiops customer advisory council and ibm's top rated awards from trust radius all on this episode of ibm cloud now what's up y'all my name is ian and i am back to bring you the latest and greatest news and announcements from ibm cloud we've got some great topics to cover this week and i want to start with a new partnership between the ibm center for cloud training and freelancer the world's largest freelancing and crowdsourcing marketplace together they will be making ibm cloud training programs available for use in freelancer projects and contests this will provide freelancers community of 51 million participants with the opportunity to learn cloud skills an important focus of this program is that it can help close the skill and talent gaps that are hindering cloud adoption enabling businesses to reap the rewards of cloud integration by developing a strong pool of certified developers freelancers can even participate in ibm sponsored contests and bid on cloud projects allowing them to build cloud skills and earn industry recognized certifications proving their knowledge to clients in the community to learn more about this important program check out the blog link i've included in the description of this video next up we're excited to introduce the watson ai ops customer advisory council which provides a platform for us to partner with our customers on their journey to maximize ai and automation efficiencies the advisory council brings it industry and ibm leadership together to engage in dialogue around the changing itops market landscape this program formalizes our commitment to listen and co-create with our customers in driving the next steps in it operations which is artificial intelligence for it ops or aiops events will be held once per quarter and topics will include application-centric resource management reducing mean time to resolution and other practices used to accelerate an organization's journey to i.t operational excellence for more info on the advisory council and its vision hit the link below i'm gonna wrap things up this week with a little bit of a celebration because we're proud to announce we've earned top rated awards from trust radius for the second year in a row trust radius only awards top rated badges to the products in the top tier of their categories and it's fueled by peer reviews the ibm products that earned this distinction this year are the ibm cloud kubernetes service cloud databases cloud object storage cloud bare metal servers cloud virtual servers ibm watson studio and ibm blockchain platform a big thank you to all of our customers who submitted reviews because it guides our product roadmaps and shapes our customer experiences for a complete rundown on ibm's top rated awards see the link below thanks so much for joining me today for this episode of ibm cloud now if you're interested in learning more about the topics i've covered make sure you explore the links in the description of this video and again please don't forget to subscribe to our channel to stay up to date on what's going on in the cloud now
